title: Im at 518 can you help me get to 520? So Close! Bradley Portrait? Hallman?
author: Maxjacks

posts.post_title: Im at 518 can you help me get to 520? So Close! Bradley Portrait? Hallman?
posts.post_content:
Here is a list of commons I'm still looking for in SGC 2.5-4 with nice fronts

Any help would be appreciated please send me an email at [url]maxjcards@gmail.com[/url] 
Thanks


Bradley, Bill Portrait
Hallman, Bill

I sent you an email on Groom.
Ben
(and everything is negotiable)

[quote name="benge610" post=2219977]I sent you an email on Groom.
Ben
(and everything is negotiable)[/QUOTE]

Hi Max.
as a follow up; did you have a figure in mind on the Groom? Mine is down to $70 on the FB Group, "$100 and Under, Prewar T206". I am more comfortable dealing in the forum here.
Or, are you uninterested in it, at any cost.
Thanks for your interest,
Ben

"I love baseball history backstory; especially when it involves cards."

Ben,

Thanks for the follow up on Groom. For me with the crease that breaks the surface in the top left corner I would not be interested in that card.

Thank you for checking in again with me

[quote name="Maxjacks" post=2222076]Ben,

Thanks for the follow up on Groom. For me with the crease that breaks the surface in the top left corner I would not be interested in that card.

Thank you for checking in again with me[/QUOTE]

Thank you Max, appreciate.
Ben
I have some stuff for trade for these last handful

Hi Max.  I have a bunch of Hallmans including rare backs.  Cycle, AB, BL350, blank back, etc.  What are you looking for?  FB message or text.  

Vr Zach


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Still looking. Taken a few off since the last bump. I have some nice cards for traded
